name: F1 Crazy Stunts
description:
Have you ever imagined doing stunts with a formula 1 car? Welcome to the parallel universe!

The world where everything is possible. F1 Crazy Stunts is a racing about adrenaline and speed tied together. Connect yourself on this wave to be able to perform spectacular movements, which you will never forget and about which you will not be ashamed to tell your friends. Your mission is to pass successful with the help of a formula 1 car the missions from the beggining to the end without falling from the sky. Remember that for each mission you will have a limited time.

It is important to always have your foot on the brake to be able to avoid any unpleasant situation that may appear out of the blue, being at an enormous height compared to sea level.
Are you ready to raise the stunts to another level?

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- 4 Formula 1 cars
- Daily Reward
- Limited time for each mission
